name: Spirit Box
description:
Heya there my hushpuppies! It's Eaccoonger and I'm here with another Bitsy game, Spirit Box. Travel through an old hotel/motel with your trust EMF Detector and Spirit box as you search for spirits to speak with!

Gameplay:

  • Move your cursor to the arrows to switch between rooms.
  • Move your cursor to the EMF Detector (bottom left) to check the electromagnetic field of each room. Your EMF Detector will tell you whether or not there is a spirit in the room and whether or not you can interact with the Spirit Box.
  • When you are able to use the Spirit Box in a specific room, move your cursor to the Spirit Box (bottom right)

Note(s):

  1. Any and all glitches in the text are intended.
  2. Make sure to check your EMF detector in each room! Your EMF detector will tell you when you can use your Spirit Box or not.
  3. Investigate OUTSIDE THE POOLHOUSE before you investigate INSIDE THE POOLHOUSE or the conversation you have with the spirit inside the poolhouse won't make sense.

Here's a video if you get stuck! 

Stay safe my dudes ✌
